long_description: Don't let imperfect conditions stop you--protect your face from biting wind and snow with this combination face mask/neck gaiter and hit the slopes! Offering windproof, waterproof protection from cold, this moisture-wicking, fleece-lined neoprene face guard is the ultimate in comfort. Neofleece(R) face mask features vents at nose and mouth to allow free and easy breathing. Integral polyester fleece neck gaiter secures in back with hook-and-loop tabs. Lycra(R) spandex binding trims the edges.
